name: Hardshell Softcore
description:
HardshellSoftcore is an action-heavy arena-shooter, which combines intense action with fast movement and a tight score-system.

You are a Squishy. You are very cute. Your planet and fellow Squishys are under attack.

An Alien hive Mind sent its hordes to your world. You have to save the planet by defeating all enemy waves and reach their boss. Your Mechsystem and its firepower will help you to reach this goal.
